description: patch a seismic store subproject or dataset
help: *subproject   : the seismic store subproject path. sd://<tenant>/<subproject>
| --idtoken=<value>  pass id token to use, rather than generating a new one
| --access-policy=<dataset> access policy of the subproject to be patched. allowed value is dataset
(options)     | --tier=<tier> (Azure only) request to update a dataset's storage tier to either Hot/Cool or Cold storage
| --seismicmeta=<value> the seismic storage metadata file (json format for dataset only)
| --idtoken=<value>  pass id token to use, rather than generating a new one
name: patch
